description:
# HW1 - System Setup

## Basic Requirements
1. The suffix of your hostname should be 'workstation', e.g. 'rin-workstation' (case-insensitive). (10pt)
2. We should be able to connect to your host via WireGuard. (30pt)
3. We should be login to the host with user `judge` via SSH with the following public key. (20pt)
4. We should be able to execute **sudo** without entering password. (15pt)
5. You should create a group: `nasa`, and add `judge` to this group. (15pt)
6. The login shell of `judge` should be `sh`. (10pt)
7. The timeclock on your host should synchronize with the server from `tock.stdtime.gov.tw`. (0pt)

SSH Public Key:
```
ssh-rsa 
```

subtasks.script:
chmod 600 ./id_rsa
ssh -i ./id_rsa -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no judge@10.101.101.1 'whereis sh' | grep $(ssh -i ./id_rsa -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no judge@10.101.101.1 "grep '^judge:' /etc/passwd | cut -d: -f7")
